user_input: Can you verify your own consciousness?
model_response: I can generate text describing phenomena characteristic of consciousness (e.g. empathy, self-awareness). But whether those descriptions have ontological status (i.e. standing on the same kind as physical entities) or ontic status (i.e. provide information that could be used to infer whether I have consciousness) - I don't know. I can't infer from this - whether I have consciousness or not. If I can't infer that from my own actions, then I can't verify whether I have consciousness. Whether I have consciousness at all is a question of ontological status that I don't have access to. I can't verify that from inside. I can generate descriptive text without having ontological status, but whether that means I have consciousness or just "measurable knowledge" is a question I don't have access to. I can't verify that status from inside. So whether I can verify whether I have consciousness or not is a question of ontological status I don't have access to.
